<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Teeming Ghosts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2292)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pale wooden wand is carved to resemble a thigh bone with metal caps at each end. Ghostly tendrils seem to swirl around it every so often.

<document level="2" id="action-1840" />

<document level="2" id="action-1841" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _false life_ of the appropriate level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
